title: Die Leiden des jungen Werther - Zweites Buch (von Johann Wolfgang von Goethe)
author: Unknown
content: Wanderer Above the Sea Fog (Caspar David Friedrich)

This complete text of “Die Leiden des jungen Werther” by Johann Wolfgang von Goethe,
as well as the paintings by Caspar David Friedrich, are in the public domain.
